parameters.name: App
parameters.description: The name of the application to which the live stream belongs.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC. The end time must be later than the start time. The maximum time range that can be specified is 10 hours. If you specify neither StartTime nor EndTime, the data of the last hour is queried by default.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: Stream
parameters.description: The name of the ingested stream.
